name: minions-skills-workspace
description: Reusable skill definitions that agents can load, compose, and version
author: Mehdi Nabhani <mehdi@the-mehdi.com> (https://the-mehdi.com)

scripts.build: pnpm --filter @minions-skills/sdk run build && pnpm --filter @minions-skills/cli run build && pnpm --filter minions-skills-docs run build && pnpm --filter minions-skills-blog run build && pnpm --filter minions-skills-web run build
scripts.deploy:blog: pnpm --filter minions-skills-blog run build && netlify deploy --dir apps/blog/dist --prod
scripts.deploy:docs: pnpm --filter minions-skills-docs run build && netlify deploy --dir apps/docs/dist --prod
scripts.deploy:web: pnpm --filter minions-skills-web run build && netlify deploy --dir apps/web/dist --prod
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter @minions-skills/sdk run build && pnpm --filter @minions-skills/sdk run lint && pnpm --filter @minions-skills/cli run lint
